option strict-darkling-sh

Round 2 scoring: SCORE3, D >> 2
Round 3 scoring: SCORE8, TP >> 3

Round 5 scoring: SCORE6, TP >> 3
Round 6 scoring: SCORE4, SA/SH >> 5
